unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue, no? Like, farmers in Punjab use so much! My chacha, Balwinder Singh, says it's affecting the soil near Amritsar. Since 20/10/2023, he's tried organic methods. Heard IIT Delhi is researching alternatives. Costs R. 2000/acre extra though! We need solutions by 14/11/2024, before next harvest. Maybe subsidies like they had back in 1998 at 17:00 hrs? Jai Kisan!
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue, no? Like, farmers in Punjab use so much! My chacha, Balwinder Singh, says it's affecting the soil near Amritsar. Since twentieth october two thousand and twenty three, he's tried organic methods. Heard I I T Delhi is researching alternatives. Costs rupee two thousand per acre extra though! We need solutions by fourteenth november two thousand and twenty four, before next harvest. Maybe subsidies like they had back in nineteen ninety eight at five o'clock P M? Jai Kisan!
